Ask HN: What are your thoughts on the lack of 3rd-party Data Privacy apps [iOS]
text:
Apple products are notorious for data privacy issues, from hacking attacks to user configuration errors. However, no comprehensive 3rd-party Data Privacy apps exist for ensuring device-level information security for the average user.

Is Apple preventing such apps from release on the App Store; is there a wisdom to Apple-only data security?

What are your thoughts?

This question will likely become more and more relevant with the consumer use of airtags; with the advent of Apple Watch’s ovulation tracking; with the overall lack of data security within the Apple ecosystem.

title: Show HN: TattoosAI – AI-powered tattoo artist, using Stable Diffusion
text: Hey HN, last week I've been building TattoosAI as a little learning project to get comfortable with Stable Diffusion & DALL-E. I'm absolutely shocked by how powerful SD is... Just like how GPT-3 helped copywriters/marketing be more effective, SD/DALL-E is going to be a game changer for artist!
